# allowsDocumentBackgroundColorChange

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver allows its background color to change.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsDocumentBackgroundColorChange: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver allows the background color to change, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Setting graphics attributes

- **backgroundColor**: The receiver’s background color.
- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver draws its background.
- **changeDocumentBackgroundColor(_:)**: An action method used to set the background color.
